data.text:
üöÄ Reflecting on our incredible journey at Vensure Employer Solutions over the past four years! When I joined Vensure in September 2020, John Dnyprowsky was building a team of all-stars to support the newly formed Northeast region. We were a small group of 8, operating out of a WeWork on Madison Ave during the height of the pandemic. Resilience was a requirement as we navigated new insurance policies, partner relationships, late nights, and growth plans. Fast forward to September 2024, and Vensure has transformed beyond recognition. Our sales organization has grown 10x to 500+ employees, with our Northeast team now comprising 25 consultants. Our new Park Ave office is filled with energy and complete with ample desks for our expanding team! At the recent Vensure Sales Kickoff (VSKO), I had the privilege of speaking in front of our entire sales organization alongside Shane McCarthy, Anne Erdman, Nicole Sussman, Jason Olson, and Tim McReavy. It‚Äôs truly inspiring to see how far we‚Äôve come together. A huge thank you to our leadership team for their unwavering support and dedication throughout this journey. Here‚Äôs to achieving even greater heights together! Philip Urso John Dnyprowsky Jordan Alda David Bercow Jordan Gifford Daniel Marrs Claire Palmer Joe Volino Adam Cruickshank Conor Broderick Jack Isaf James Holloman Jordan Witler Justine Abbate Kyle Baney Maria Heredia Matt Boyd Nicole Sussman Nikhil Jude Timothy O'Brien Yael Oshman #VensureHR #PEO #ASO #PRO #HCM #BPO #TeamGrowth #SalesKickoff

Thrilled to be representing Greenleaf HR, a Vensure Employer Solutions company at the 2024 Cannabis Law Institute Event in Chicago! We are so grateful for the opportunity to be sponsoring the worlds leading community in perhaps one of the fastest growing yet complex areas of law. Greenleaf HR is one of the few Professional Employer Organizations (PEO) that is capable of partnering with cannabis clients, supporting them with employment related challenges from "seed to sale". See you in July! International Cannabis Bar Association, Greenleaf HR, Vensure Employer Solutions Joel Pearson Robert Doran Brandon J. Hancock

Join us on June 12th for an insightful webinar hosted by one of Vensure Employer Solutions most exciting verticals - SolvoHR - where we'll dive deep into the latest BPO trends and strategies shaping the future of HR management. In today's dynamic business landscape, staying ahead means harnessing the power of innovative solutions. Whether you're an HR professional, business owner, or aspiring leader, this webinar is tailor-made for you. Discover how Solvo's staff and expertise can provide financial stability, boost efficiency, and drive organizational success. Don't miss out on this opportunity to gain valuable insights and network with industry peers. Register now and secure your spot! #SolvoHR #HRmanagement #Webinar #VensureHR

Excited to share that I've made it to President's Club for the third year in a row! It's an honor to be recognized among the top Sales producers at Vensure Employer Solutions. None of this would be possible without the support of my incredible Northeast squad and fearless leadership team. But the excitement doesn't stop there... I'm trilled to announce that I have already qualified for next year's President's Club in Mexico! üèñ Looking forward to another year of growth, achievements, and unforgettable experiences! üöÄ #VensureHR #PresidentsClub #HardWorkPaysOff #TeamEffort #PEO Shoutout to our Creative team for some great shots! If you are on UnitedHealthcare with employees located in NYC, they will no longer have in-network access to Mount Sinai Health System. üö® üè• Vensure Employer Solutions can be a great option, offering in-network solutions through both Aetna, a CVS Health Company and Anthem Blue Cross and Blue Shield to our clients. üë®‚öïÔ∏è üë©‚öïÔ∏è Please send me a DM if you're interested in a medical quote from our #PEO, or feel free to schedule time with me directly here: https://lnkd.in/deAdpKFr https://www.uhc.com/sinai Jordan Alda John Dnyprowsky David Bercow Daniel Marrs Philip Urso Jordan Witler Jordan Gifford Jennifer Gillings Claire Palmer Joe Volino Conor Broderick Justine Abbate Jack Isaf Nicole Sussman Hayden Marrs
